price: Má ṣe tẹ̀lé ohun tí ìwọ kò nímọ̀ nípa rẹ̀. Dájúdájú ìgbọ́rọ̀, ìríran àti ọkàn; ìkọ̀ọ̀kan ìwọ̀nyẹn ni A óò bèèrè nípa rẹ̀.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡفُ مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٌۚ إِنَّ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡبَصَرَ وَٱلۡفُؤَادَ كُلُّ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ كَانَ عَنۡهُ مَسۡـُٔولٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walā taqfu mā laysa laka bihi ʿil'mun inna al-samʿa wal-baṣara wal-fuāda kullu ulāika kāna ʿanhu masūlan
